faq.description: Find answers to your main questions. If you don't find it here, our chat responds in minutes.

q1.question: Do I need to know about crypto to use diBoaS?
q1.answer:
Not at all! Most of our users had never invested before.

Aqua was built specifically for complete beginners. It explains every term, every step, every decision.

It's like having a patient friend teaching you.

q2.question: How much do I need to start?
q2.answer:
$10 is enough.

Seriously. Ten dollars.

The idea is for you to start small, build confidence, and then increase when you feel comfortable.

q3.question: How long does it take to open an account?
q3.answer:
Less than 5 minutes.

You'll need:
- Social Security Number / Tax ID
- Phone with camera (for selfie verification)
- A valid email

That's it. No paperwork, no bureaucracy.

q4.question: How do these guides work?
q4.answer:
They're AI assistants that observe how you use the app and reveal new features when you're ready.

Real example:

Week 1: You only see Aqua. You make your first $10 investment.

Week 3: You've made 5 small investments and are exploring the app.
Mystic appears: "Want to learn about stocks and ETFs?"

Month 3: You have a diversified portfolio. Coral suggests: "I see you understand risk. Want to explore high-yield DeFi?"

You never see everything at once. Just what you need right now.

q5.question: Will I always see all the guides?
q5.answer:
No! You start with just Aqua.

Mystic and Coral appear progressively as you're ready for more advanced features.

This prevents overwhelm while preserving sophistication.

q6.question: Can I "go back" if something gets too complicated?
q6.answer:
Always.

There's a "Simplify" button on any screen. If you activated something and found it confusing, just turn it off.

No penalties, no questions asked.

q7.question: Are the guides mandatory?
q7.answer:
No. You can use the app without them.

But 94% of our users prefer to keep the guides active because they really help prevent getting lost.

q8.question: Is my money safe on diBoaS?
q8.answer:
Yes. Same security standards as major banks.

- Non-custodial wallets (you own your assets)
- Military-grade encryption
- Compliance with Federal Reserve, MiCA (Europe), and SEC regulations
- Audited by independent security firms

In 2024, we had ZERO cases of money loss due to security failures.

q9.question: What if diBoaS shuts down one day?
q9.answer:
You lose nothing.

Your crypto stays in wallets that YOU control.
Your traditional investments are held by regulated institutions.

Even if we disappeared, you'd have full access to your funds.

q10.question: Can diBoaS touch my money?
q10.answer:
No. Technically impossible.

The guides give advice and recommendations. But every transaction requires YOUR password, YOUR biometrics, YOUR confirmation.

We have no way to move a penny without your authorization.

q11.question: How much does it cost to use diBoaS?
q11.answer:
Transparent fees:

┌────────────────────┬─────────────┬────────────────┐
│ Operation          │ You pay     │ Others charge  │
├────────────────────┼─────────────┼────────────────┤
│ Open account       │ $0          │ $0 - $50       │
│ Maintain account   │ $0/month    │ $15-$50/month  │
│ Invest $100        │ $0.09       │ $2 - $10       │
│ Transfer $100      │ $0.90       │ $3 - $5        │
│ Instant transfer   │ $0          │ Varies         │
│ within diBoaS      │             │                │
└────────────────────┴─────────────┴────────────────┘

No tricks. No fine print.

We always show you the exact cost before you confirm anything.

q12.question: Is there a mandatory subscription?
q12.answer:
No.

Basic features are free forever.

Advanced features (like ultra-personalized AI or professional analysis) may have optional plans for $12.90/month.

But you can use it just fine without paying anything.

q13.question: How do you make money then?
q13.answer:
Total transparency:

1. Small transaction fee (that 0.09% and 0.9%)

2. Content creators using our platform pay 0.9%
   (much less than YouTube's 10%)

3. Optional subscriptions for advanced features

We earn when you use it. Not when you just keep the account open.

q1.question: What exactly is diBoaS?
q1.answer:
The world's first OneFi platform.

Banking, Investing, Crypto, Strategies, and DeFi in one app.
No juggling 5 different platforms.

Think of it like this:
Your bank + brokerage + crypto exchange + DeFi protocols,
all rolled into one account.

q2.question: Do I need to understand finance to use this?
q2.answer:
Not at all.

Actually, 87% of our users had never invested before joining.

Aqua was built specifically for complete beginners.
She explains every term, every step, every decision.

It's like having a patient friend teach you everything.

q3.question: How much does it cost to use diBoaS?

q4.question: Can I really start with just $10?
q4.answer:
Yes. Seriously. Ten bucks.

Here's how:

1. Open your account (under 5 minutes)
2. Deposit $10
3. Aqua shows you exactly where to invest

The idea is to start small, build confidence,
then scale up when you're ready.

q5.question: Is diBoaS a checking or savings account?
q5.answer:
Neither—it's a payment account.

This means you can make payments and transfers using your 
available balance, plus receive money from others.

When transferring from another bank, select any of these:
- Checking Account
- Savings Account
- Payment Account

All work for depositing into diBoaS.

q6.question: How much does my idle cash earn?
q6.answer:
Equivalent to 100% of the base rate.

Automatically. Without doing anything.

Real example:
- Base rate at 4.5% annually
- You keep $1,000 in your account
- Earns approximately $45 per year

No fees. No tricks. Your money works while you decide what to do with it.

Under 5 minutes.

You'll need:
- Social Security Number / Tax ID
- Phone with camera (for selfie verification)
- Valid email

That's it. Zero paperwork, zero bureaucracy.

Most people finish while waiting for their coffee.

q8.question: Can I have both personal and business accounts?
q8.answer:
Yes! They're completely separate.

Personal account: for your financial life
Business account: for your company

You access both through the same app, but each has 
its own balance, statements, and features.

Perfect if you're self-employed or a freelancer.

q9.question: Can I make international transfers?
q9.answer:
Yes! And in real-time.

diBoaS allows instant transfers to:
- Any bank in the US (ACH/Wire)
- Accounts in Europe, UK, and Latin America
- Other diBoaS accounts (always free and instant)

Transparent fees shown before confirming.
No surprises on currency conversion.

q10.question: Are there limits on transfers?
q10.answer:
You control your own limits.

Default security limits:
- Instant transfers: $1,000/transaction, $5,000/day
- Wire transfers: $10,000/day

But you can:
- Increase these amounts in-app
- Create custom limits
- Enable "Street Mode" that zeros limits when you're out

Security without getting in your way.

q16.answer:
$10.

Ten dollars. Seriously.

diBoaS democratizes: start with whatever you want.

Real example:
- Month 1: Invest $10, learn how it works
- Month 2: Confident, add $50
- Month 3: Scale up to $200

No pressure. No minimums.

q17.question: What can I invest in?
q17.answer:
Everything you need:

Traditional Investments:
- Stocks (Apple, Google, Tesla...)
- ETFs (diversified funds)
- Bonds (fixed income)
- Index Funds

All in the same app, all starting at $10.

Aqua recommends based on your profile and goals.

q18.question: Can I lose money investing?
q18.answer:
Yes, all investments carry risk.

But diBoaS helps minimize it:

1. Diversification: Never put all eggs in one basket
2. Education: Aqua explains each risk before investing
3. Progression: We start with safer investments
4. Transparency: You always know exactly the risk of each asset

Golden rule: Only invest money you won't need 
in the next few months.

q19.question: How do investment fees work?
q19.answer:
0.09% per buy/sell transaction.

Real example:
- You invest $100
- diBoaS fee: $0.09
- Actual investment: $99.91

Compare:
- diBoaS: $0.09
- Traditional banks: $2 to $10
- Brokerages: $5 to $15

We're 22x cheaper than market average.

q20.question: What's the difference between investing and speculating?
q20.answer:
Investing = Planting a tree
Speculating = Betting at a casino

Investing:
- Years horizon
- Based on analysis
- Calculated risk
- Goal: build wealth

Speculating:
- Days/hours horizon
- Based on "feelings"
- High risk
- Goal: get rich quick

Investment Guide teaches you to invest for real.
No magic shortcuts, but it works.

q21.question: How much should I invest monthly?
q21.answer:
The 20% rule:

Ideally:
- 20% of income for investments
- 50% for essentials
- 30% for lifestyle

Reality:
- Starting with 5% is already a win
- Increase 1% each quarter
- Reach 20% in 1-2 years

Real example:
Income $2,000/month
→ Start with $100/month (5%)
→ After 1 year: $200/month (10%)
→ After 2 years: $400/month (20%)

q22.question: Individual stocks or funds? How to choose?
q22.answer:
Depends on your style:

Individual Stocks:
✓ More control
✓ Potential for bigger gains
✗ Requires more study
✗ Higher risk

Funds/ETFs:
✓ Automatic diversification
✓ Professional management
✓ Perfect for beginners
✗ Management fees

Aqua recommendation for beginners:
80% in funds/ETFs + 20% in stocks you know.

q23.question: Do I need to understand crypto to start?
q23.answer:
Not at all!

Most of our users had never bought crypto before.

Aqua guides you step by step:
1. Explains what Bitcoin, Ethereum, etc. are
2. Shows you can start with just $10
3. Suggests a safe first purchase
4. Walks you through every step

It's like having an expert friend teach you.

q24.question: Is my crypto safe on diBoaS?
q24.answer:
Yes. Military-grade security.

How we protect you:
- Non-custodial wallets (YOU control your assets)
- Military-grade encryption
- Mandatory biometric authentication
- Independent quarterly audits

If diBoaS disappeared tomorrow, you lose nothing.
Your crypto is in wallets that ONLY you control.

q25.question: What cryptos can I buy?
q25.answer:
We start with the most established:

Tier 1 (Aqua recommends for beginners):
- Bitcoin (BTC)
- Ethereum (ETH)
- USD Coin (USDC - stablecoin)

Tier 2 (Mystic unlocks later):
- Solana, Cardano, Polkadot...
- Total of 29+ curated assets

Coral (for advanced users):
- DeFi tokens
- Yield farming opportunities

All starting at $10.

q26.question: How much does buying crypto cost?
q26.answer:
0.09% diBoaS fee + network fees.

Real example buying $100 of Bitcoin:
- diBoaS fee: $0.09
- Network blockchain fee: ~$1.50
- Total received: ~$98.41

Compare with other exchanges:
- Coinbase: 1.49% = $1.49 (16x more expensive)
- Binance: 0.50% = $0.50 (5x more expensive)
- diBoaS: 0.09% = $0.09

We show everything before you confirm.

q27.question: Is Bitcoin a pyramid scheme/scam?
q27.answer:
No. But there are many scams USING Bitcoin.

Bitcoin is:
- Legitimate technology (15 years operating)
- Adopted by governments and companies
- Transparent (all code is public)

Scams USE Bitcoin:
- Promises of guaranteed returns
- "Double your Bitcoin" schemes
- Influencers selling shady courses

Crypto A-Z teaches you to differentiate:
What's real vs. what's a scam.

q28.question: Have I missed the boat on Bitcoin?
q28.answer:
Wrong question!

Nobody knows if Bitcoin will go up or down tomorrow.

Right question:
"Does crypto make sense in my long-term portfolio?"

Smart strategy:
- Start small ($10-50)
- Buy regularly (every month)
- Think in years, not days
- Never more than 5-10% of total net worth

Dollar-cost averaging > trying to time the market.

q29.question: Which crypto should I buy first?
q29.answer:
For 99% of people:

1st purchase: Bitcoin (BTC)
- Most established
- Most secure
- Most liquid

2nd purchase: Ethereum (ETH)
- Second largest
- Solid technology
- Use case beyond "currency"

3rd purchase: Stablecoin (USDC)
- To hold value without volatility
- To seize opportunities quickly

Only after mastering these 3, explore others.
Crypto A-Z explains each in detail.

q30.question: What are these "strategies"?
q30.answer:
Think of them as "smart piggy banks" that grow your money.

Real example:

Emergency Fund Strategy:
- You put in $500
- diBoaS automatically invests in safe DeFi protocols
- Earns ~8-12% annually
- You can withdraw anytime

It's professional investing, simplified for anyone to use.

q31.question: Do I need to understand DeFi?
q31.answer:
Nope! That's the magic.

DeFi (Decentralized Finance) is complex:
- Protocols, pools, yields, farms...
- 99% of people don't get it

diBoaS simplifies:
- You choose "I want to save for emergencies"
- We handle all the technical complexity
- You just see: "Earning 10.5% annually"

Coral explains what's happening, but you don't 
need to understand to use it.

q32.question: How much do strategies earn?
q32.answer:
Varies, but we always show real-time rates:

Conservative Strategies (Mystic recommends):
- Emergency Fund: 8-12% annually
- Stable Growth: 10-15% annually

Moderate Strategies (Coral unlocks):
- Balanced Yield: 15-25% annually
- Growth Portfolio: 20-35% annually

Aggressive Strategies (advanced only):
- High Yield: 35-80% annually (higher risk)

Fees: 0.09% to start + 0.09% to stop strategy.

q33.question: Can I lose money in strategies?
q33.answer:
Yes, all investments carry risk.

But we minimize it several ways:

1. Gradual progression: Start with safe strategies only
2. Auto-diversification: Your money goes to multiple protocols
3. 24/7 monitoring: We detect issues before you do
4. Insurance fund: Coverage for extreme cases

Rule: Aggressive strategies only appear when you've 
demonstrated sufficient knowledge.

Coral won't let you do something dumb.

q34.question: What is DeFi anyway?
q34.answer:
DeFi = Decentralized Finance

In plain English:
Doing bank stuff (lending, investing, earning interest)
without needing banks.

Real example:

Traditional bank:
- You deposit $1,000
- Bank pays 2% annually
- Bank lends your money at 15% annually
- Bank keeps the difference

DeFi:
- You lend directly to who needs it
- Earn 8-15% annually
- Protocol charges 0.09%
- You keep the rest

DeFi Explained decodes all of this.

q35.question: Is DeFi safe?
q35.answer:
Safer than it looks, less safe than it should be.

Truths about DeFi security:

✓ Main protocols constantly audited
✓ Smart contracts are transparent (open source)
✓ No intermediaries = fewer failure points

✗ New protocols can have bugs
✗ Hacks happen (but are decreasing)
✗ Need to understand what you're doing

How diBoaS protects you:
- Only uses audited and established protocols
- Automatically diversifies
- 24/7 risk monitoring
- Insurance fund for extreme cases

q36.question: Do I need to be a programmer to use DeFi?
q36.answer:
No! That's exactly why diBoaS exists.

DeFi directly (without diBoaS):
- Set up wallets
- Understand gas fees
- Interact with smart contracts
- Monitor multiple protocols
→ Complexity: Expert

DeFi through diBoaS:
- Choose "I want 10% yield"
- Tap "Start"
- Track in app
→ Complexity: Beginner

DeFi Explained teaches you what happens behind the scenes,
but you don't need to touch code.

q37.question: How does credit work on diBoaS?
q37.answer:
Fair credit, transparent, and under your control.

Available types:

1. Personal Credit: Unsecured, fast approval
2. Secured Credit: Using your investments as collateral 
   (MUCH lower rates)
3. Credit Line: Pre-approved limit, use when needed

All in-app, no branches or call centers needed.

q38.question: What interest rates do you charge?
q38.answer:
Depends on credit type and your profile:

Secured Credit (cheapest):
- With crypto/investments as collateral
- 0.5% to 2% monthly

❌ Artificial urgency
"Offer expires in 1 hour!"
→ Scammers create urgency so you make mistakes

❌ Ask for password/private keys
"Send your seed phrase to support"
→ NEVER share this with ANYONE

❌ Promise of "free money"
"Send 1 BTC, receive 2 BTC back"
→ Classic doubling scam

❌ diBoaS contacting you outside app
→ We don't call asking for data
→ We don't DM on Instagram
→ Only official channels

Stay Safe has complete list + interactive quiz.

q117.question: How do I delete my data?

Right guaranteed by GDPR/CCPA.

Process:

1. In-app:

   privacy@diboas.com
   Subject: "Account Deletion Request"

What happens:

Immediate (24h):
- Account deactivated
- Access blocked
- Personal data marked for deletion

30 days:

After 30 days:
- Permanent deletion
- Irrecoverable
- Only compliance data kept (regulatory)

Data kept for compliance:
- Transactions (7 years - law)
- KYC documents (5 years - regulation)
- Reports sent to authorities

Everything else: PERMANENTLY DELETED.

q118.question: Why do you use cookies?
q118.answer:
To make website work and improve experience.

Cookie types:

Essential (can't disable):
- Keep you logged in
- Remember settings
- Anti-fraud security
→ Without these, site doesn't work

Functional (can disable):
- Remember preferences
- Chosen language
- Dark/light theme

Analytics (can disable):
- Most visited pages
- Where users get stuck
- Site performance

Marketing (can disable):
- Track origin (Google ads, etc)
- Retargeting (show ads)

You control everything in Cookie Consent banner.

q119.question: Do cookies track everything I do?
q119.answer:
No. Only interactions with diBoaS.

What cookies CAN see:
✓ diBoaS pages you visit
✓ How long you stay on each page
✓ Buttons you click on our site
✓ Where you came from (Google search, direct link, etc)

What cookies DON'T see:
✗ Other sites you browse
✗ Your email or messages
✗ Content in other apps
✗ Precise location (just city/region)

Third-party cookies (Google, Facebook):
We use ONLY if you allow in consent banner.

Easily disabled:
Settings > Privacy > Cookie Preferences

q120.question: How do I delete diBoaS cookies?
q120.answer:
Multiple ways:

Method 1: Site settings
1. Open diboas.com
2. Footer > Cookie Preferences
3. "Delete All Cookies"
4. Confirm

Method 2: Browser
- Chrome: Settings > Privacy > Clear browsing data
- Firefox: Preferences > Privacy > Clear Data
- Safari: Preferences > Privacy > Manage Website Data

Method 3: Browser extensions
- uBlock Origin
- Privacy Badger
- Ghostery

Consequences of deleting cookies:
- Will log you out of site
- Lose saved preferences
- Need to re-accept cookie consent

Cookies return when you visit site again
(unless you configure to block)

Alternative: Incognito/Private browsing
Cookies don't persist after closing tab.
